section.title: The View Financial Account Reconciliations screen.
section.para: This screen gives an overview of a reconciliation group / bank reconciliation. Note that a reconciliation must have at least one transaction associated with it for this screen to be displayed. It is used as follows:

listitem.para: to view transactions associated with a reconciliation group / bank reconciliation
to remove transactions from a reconciliation group / bank reconciliation
to reconcile the reconciliation group / bank reconciliation

section.para: The screen displays the current reconciliation details plus details of the previous reconciliation if one exists. This ensures the closing balance of the previous reconciliation is the same as the opening balance for the current one.

listitem.para: Press the 'Edit' button in the 'Current Bank Reconciliation'part of the screen
The 'Edit Financial Account Reconciliations' screen isdisplayed

section.title: How do I remove a transaction from a bank reconciliation?
section.para: On the lower part of the screen a list of all transactions associated with the reconciliation is displayed.

listitem.para: Press the 'Remove' button next to the entry that needs to be removed

section.title: How do I reconcile a bank reconciliation?

listitem.para: A total of all transactions associated with the reconciliation is shown in the lower part of the screen
Press the 'Reconcile' button next to the total

Each transaction status will be changed to 'Approved' and the reconciliation / bank reconciliation status will be changed to 'Reconciled' (NOTE: This means that no new transactions can be added to this reconciliation and it will no longer be available to assign transactions to)
